customer_reviews.title: This draw knife works very well; it's compact, sharp, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is yet another quality product from Beaver Craft. If you are into wood carving, whittling, and/or bushcraft, this is the draw knife for you, i.e., it's compact, it's sharp, will be easy to maintain, and most of all it works. Above I posted several pictures of two quick tests I put the draw knife through. The first image shows the tree before the use of the BeaverCraft draw knife. The second image shows how well it debarks a conifer. It took only seconds. The third image demonstrates how well it shaves layers off. I piled the shavings for view. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Great, Super Sharp Tool!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This tool is awesome! This is my third tool purchase from BeaverCraft and I continue to be pleased with their quality, great pricing, and durability of tool! Out of the box, this draw knife comes razor sharp and ready to work. The leather sheath is real leather and snaps together nicely and smoothly. BeaverCraft even includes bandages in the box which I find awesome, too. PROS: Affordable, Sharp, All-Inclusive Kit, Durable, Great Value CONS: I only need to buy one :-) (In other words... NO CONS!)
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but better the rest.

It has good polished harden steel and keeps an edge. Finding quality hand tools of this nature has been somewhat frustrating. Nice to know someone is paying attention.
